title: Transaction Master
summary: End-to-end log parsing, data enrichment pipelines, REST APIs with PostgreSQL/MySQL backends, Elasticsearch aggregations and Kibana dashboards.
details: Built reliable logging ingestion and aggregation pipelines, designed REST APIs for data access, and scaled infrastructure for production workloads.

title: Reconciliation Automation
summary: Python microservices for trade reconciliation, Kafka-based data pipelines and S3 ingestion.
details: Designed microservices that process and reconcile high-volume financial data and integrated DataDog for real-time alerting.

title: ML Cricket Analysis System
summary: Machine learning ranking system for cricket player selection using Python and statistical analysis.
details: Implemented ranking algorithms, statistical feature extraction, and model evaluation for player selection use-cases.

title: Flight Booking Application
summary: Cross-platform mobile app using Xamarin with .NET backend and Azure deployment.
details: Developed client apps and integrated Azure services for cloud deployment and continuous delivery.
